about.afropa: AFROPA i imports and exports textiles, leather goods, adornments, decorations, toys, textile meter ware, among other things.AFROPA specialized in the trade between Europe and Africa.AFROPA is a dynamic enterprise with world-wide relations.AFROPA takes over your orders and implements these professionally.AFROPA takes over all administrativs and customs-formalities.AFROPA On request we obtain the products of all states of Africa, if wished by you, economically and in time.
about.us.title: About Us
terms.title: Sale and delivery terms
terms.one.title: Contracts
terms.one.content: For all contracts needed for the legal validity of the written form.
terms.two.title: Price
terms.two.content: Our prices are net, in Swiss francs, excluding VAT, subject to uninsured, from Schaffhausen. Price changes as well as technical adjustments, etc. Mass changes are reserved.
terms.three.title: Delivery dates and times for delivery
terms.three.content: These are deemed to be met if the supplies within the time limits of Afropa confirmed. Treaty changes require the agreement of new delivery deadlines. Delays in the execution of the contracts are of the Afropa timely and justified withdrawal and entitle the customer to cancel the contracts.
terms.four.content:
The invoice issued at the time of fulfillment. The payment terms are: 
30 days from invoicing net. For larger orders, the Afropa in mutual agreement entitled to payment of the following conditions apply: 1 / 3 of the contract sum when the contract is entered into, 1 / 3 of the sum of the shipment readiness to 1 / 3 of the sum 30 days from the invoice date. In default of payment, the Afropa a default interest rate of 8% into account.
terms.four.title: Invoicing payments
terms.five.content: Each delivery is within a reasonable time, a maximum of 7 days, to consider. Any complaints immediately after the discovery to be made and are justified, preferably in writing. Defects not authorize withholding of payments.
terms.five.title: Defects
terms.six.title: Retention of title
terms.six.content: The services provided will remain until the complete payment of the relevant invoices property of Afropa.
terms.seven.title: General provisions
terms.seven.content: Where nothing special has been agreed, subject to the provisions of the Swiss Code of Obligations.
terms.eight.title: Applied law and the place of performance
terms.eight.content: It will in any case Swiss law. Where discrepancies no agreement can be reached, Schaffhausen as a business location of Afropa performance.
